duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain UI components, styling/interactivity libraries, and build/deploy tools for the Amazon.com front end development ecosystem.
Work with a team to set the standard for frontend development at Amazon, ensuring modern, fresh, and visually coherent customer experiences.
Accelerate frontend development by reducing the time and effort required to build new experiences for shoppers, through the use of reusable components and automation.
Evangelize and educate on front-end technologies and methodologies within the team and beyond.
Work on innovating technologies that accelerate customer experience innovation at Amazon, directly impacting the developer experience for Store Builders worldwide.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
